entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -13.9°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
